description: A fresh take on the classic sugar and lemon, using lemon curd and sweetened mascarpone with flaked almonds for crunch.
steps: Beat the icing sugar into the mascarpone a little at a time until smooth and sweet enough to suit your tastes.
Spread the lemon curd over the pancakes. Top with a dollop of mascarpone and the flaked almonds.
title: Lemon curd, mascarpone and almond pancakes
